thread.title: Linda Vander Haagen
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Linda Vander Haagen

author: Linda Vander Haagen
title: Linda Vander Haagen
text:
Our trip advisor, Paula, was over the top helpful having first hand knowledge of the area. She listened well providing us with a very active agenda, which we wanted, along with lovely accommodations so we could indulge ourselves.
The only disappointment was the Heritage Queenstown just not up to par, although our view was great.
